Customers can now join the NHS Organ Donor Register when they sign in to their Oyster or contactless accounts.
See the 'Help save a life' button when you sign in to your Oyster account .
We hope this partnership will increase the number of people joining the NHS Organ Donor Register and sharing their donation decision with their family.
By donating your organs after you die, you could help save and transform the lives of desperately ill people.

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Around 7,000 people across the UK are waiting for an organ transplant","On average three people die every day due to a shortage of donated organs","Black and Asian communities are particularly underrepresented on the register"]}
If you needed an organ transplant would you have one? If so please help others.
To find out more about organ donation visit organdonation.nhs.uk .
